column5: Can one of you can help me out? Yesterday my group and I signed up to go Lac Wetetnagami, for this years Fishtrip while we were at the Syracuse Sportsman Show. Now I need some insider information on where to start fishing when I get there. We will be there June 17 -24th. I have fished several lakes in the general area, always with good result, but it always takes a couple of days to learn the water. Anything you can tell me would be a big help. Thanks --John
